summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeGive BackBubble‚Äôs TALK BACK Hydrating Lip Serum leaves dry lips feeling softened and restored with a plush, glossy finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsUnflavored and fragrance-freeHydrates and smooths dry lipsLeaves a clear, glossy finishFeels nourishing without being stickyLeaves lips looking visibly soft and plumpedCan be worn alone or layered over Bubble‚Äôs Tell All lip balmDermatologist recommendedClinically testedKey IngredientsAvocado Oil & Shea Butter help provide deep nourishment for soft, smooth lips.Sunflower & Pomegranate Seed Oils are rich in antioxidants and fatty acids to help protect and replenish dry lips.Squalane helps restore moisture and support a healthy barrier.Sodium Hyaluronate helps deliver long-lasting hydration.Vitamin E helps protect and condition lips.Formulated WithoutMade without petroleum, parabens, or other harsh additives.Item 2640132How To UseSwipe directly onto lips for instant moisture and shine. Reapply as needed. Can be layered over Bubble's Tell All Lip Balm for extra nourishment.IngredientsHydrogenated Polyisobutene, Polybutene, Diisostearyl Malate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Phytosteryl/Octydodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Swipe directly onto lips for instant moisture and shine. Reapply as needed. Can be layered over Bubble's Tell All Lip Balm for extra nourishment.

reviews.headline: More hydrating than average
reviews.comments: The scent is not overpowering, consistency is great, and I was pleasantly surprised when my lips were still soft hours after it had worn off through drinking water. I have a problem with dry spots on my lips and am hopeful this will help with that.

reviews.headline: Love love love Talk Back

media.headline: My lips never felt so hydrated!!
First bubble lip product and SO worth it!!
media.caption: My fav!

faceoff_positive.comments:
I didn't expect to fall in love with a lip serum, but Bubble's TALK BACK completely changed my mind. The texture is lightweight but super hydrating ‚Äî it gives my lips a soft, healthy glow without feeling sticky or greasy. It instantly soothes dryness and actually keeps my lips moisturized for hours, which is rare for me.

The applicator is sleek and mess-free, and the formula layers really well under lip balm or even lipstick. I love using it as a treatment before bed or a glossy touch during the day. Bonus points for the clean ingredients and how cute the packaging is!

If you struggle with dry or chapped lips, this is a must-try. My lips have never felt better!
faceoff_positive.headline: My new lip essential !

faceoff_negative.comments: i was honestly so excited for the serum but ultimately, i think the formula and bottle could use a bit of work. she was not sticky, but also not hydratong. like thick in an odd way where i felt like i was just piling gunk onto my lips. as for the applicator; it certainly did not help either. i think a silicone applicator would be the way to go for a serum, or even a lip treatment instead.
faceoff_negative.headline: work in progress
